entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
